title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.21 - Employment recruitment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.21 - Employment recruitment

State Regulations

Educational institutions or other organizations offering
approved courses or employees of such institutions or organizations are
prohibited from any recruitment activities which may result in the offering of
employment of students. No recruitment activities for employment are to be
allowed by the education coordinators whatsoever. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
196.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
